textAfterTable: Game Overview Far Cry 3 is an open-world first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft Montreal in conjuction with Ubisoft Massive, Ubisoft Reflections and Ubisoft Shanghai for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC. It is being published by Ubisoft and will be the third installment in the main series. The game is set to release on November 29 2012 in Europe, November 29 2012 in Australia, November 30 2012 in UK and December 4 2012 in North America.
